snippet.title: Saint Kotar: The Ritual - Free DLC Announcement
snippet.description:
Saint Kotar: The Ritual is a free DLC that introduces Viktoria as a new playable character, new puzzles, new characters, and two hours of gameplay time that reveal many hidden parts of the story from the main game.

Release dates: Windows, Mac and Linux: 14 October 2022 | Consoles: November 2022
